description:
Tyler was being very coy.

So maybe he meant he hadn't seen it "in person."
Anyway, straight bottoms are always concerned about the top's cock because they're afraid it might be too big.

it was "too big!"
I think Tyler also loved Kurt's ass because he went down on it pretty hard. And when Kurt fucked him, Tyler's toes were really curling!
title: Tyler & Kurt
